text: Christopher Andrew "Chris" Pontius (born July 16, 1974) is an American television personality and daredevil and actor. He is one of the crew members for Jackass and for all of its movies. Pontius was born on July 16, 1974 in Pasadena, California. He is married to Claire Nolan. ==Movies== Year Movie Role Notes 2002 Jackass: The Movie Himself 2003 Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle Irish Dock Worker Cameo 2006 Jackass Number Two Himself 2006 The Dudesons Movie Himself 2007 Jackass 2.5 Himself 2007 National Lampoon's TV: The Movie Jesus Christ 2008 What We Do Is Secret Black Randy 2010 Somewhere Sammy 2010 Jackass 3D Himself 2011 Jackass 3.5 Himself ==References== ==Other websites== * * Official Myspace of Chris Pontius Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television personalities Category:Actors from Pasadena, California Category:Stunt performers
title: Chris Pontius
